PIC Code/HardwareProfile.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ///@file HardwareProfile.h
00002 ///@brief Defines the hardware (IO lines)
00003 /*********************************************************************
00004  *
00005  *      Hardware specific definitions
00006  *
00007  *********************************************************************
00008 
00009 Outputs:
00010 - External Siren
00011 - Internal Siren
00012 - Strobe
00013 
00014 Inputs:
00015 - Battery voltage ADC
00016 - Power supply ADC
00017 - Reset button 
00018 - Factory Reset button
00019 
00020 12 IO lines for analogue switch
00021 3 ADC lines
00022 
00023 Uart
00024 
00025 IO = 16
00026 ADC = 5
00027 
00028 ADCON0 LED & Helpers.c (GenerateRandomDWORD)
00029 ADCON1 LED
00030 ADCON2 Voltage on Power supply
00031 ADCON3 Voltage on Battery
00032 ADCON4 Demultiplexer 
00033 
00034 
00035  ********************************************************************/
00036 #ifndef __HARDWARE_PROFILE_H
00037 #define __HARDWARE_PROFILE_H
00038 
00039 // Choose which hardware profile to compile for here.  See 
00040 // the hardware profiles below for meaning of various options.  
00041 #define PICDEMNET2
00042 
00043 // Set configuration fuses (but only once)
00044 #if defined(THIS_IS_STACK_APPLICATION)
00045         #if defined(__18CXX)
00046 //              #if defined(__EXTENDED18__)
00047                         #pragma config XINST=ON
00048 //              #elif !defined(HI_TECH_C)
00049 //                      #pragma config XINST=OFF
00050 //              #endif
00051         #endif  
00052         // PICDEM.net 2 or any other PIC18F97J60 family device
00053         #pragma config WDT=OFF, FOSC2=ON, FOSC=HSPLL, ETHLED=ON
00054 
00055 #endif // Prevent more than one set of config fuse definitions
00056 
00057 // Clock frequency value.
00058 // This value is used to calculate Tick Counter value
00059 #define GetSystemClock()                (41666667ul)      // Hz
00060 #define GetInstructionClock()   (GetSystemClock()/4)
00061 #define GetPeripheralClock()    GetInstructionClock()
00062 
00063 
00064 // Hardware mappings
00065 // PICDEM.net 2 (PIC18F97J60 + ENC28J60)
00066         
00067         
00068         // Outputs
00069         #define INT_SIREN_TRIS                  (TRISJbits.TRISJ5)
00070         #define INT_SIREN_IO                    (PORTJbits.RJ5)
00071         #define EXT_SIREN_TRIS                  (TRISJbits.TRISJ6)
00072         #define EXT_SIREN_IO                    (PORTJbits.RJ6)
00073         #define STROBE_TRIS                             (TRISJbits.TRISJ7)
00074         #define STROBE_IO                               (PORTJbits.RJ7)
00075         #define SLA_CHARGER_TRIS                (TRISJbits.TRISJ4)
00076         #define SLA_CHARGER_IO                  (LATJbits.LATJ4)  // High activates the charger
00077 
00078         // Analogue 3 bits plus and enable 
00079         #define PLEXERA_S_TRIS                  (TRISBbits.TRISB3)
00080         #define PLEXERA_S_IO                    (PORTBbits.RB3)  // High = disabled
00081         #define PLEXERA_2_TRIS                  (TRISBbits.TRISB2)
00082         #define PLEXERA_2_IO                    (PORTBbits.RB2)
00083         #define PLEXERA_1_TRIS                  (TRISBbits.TRISB1)
00084         #define PLEXERA_1_IO                    (PORTBbits.RB1)
00085         #define PLEXERA_0_TRIS                  (TRISBbits.TRISB0)
00086         #define PLEXERA_0_IO                    (PORTBbits.RB0)
00087 
00088 
00089         #define PLEXERB_S_TRIS                  (TRISBbits.TRISB7)
00090         #define PLEXERB_S_IO                    (PORTBbits.RB7)  // High = disabled
00091         #define PLEXERB_2_TRIS                  (TRISBbits.TRISB6)
00092         #define PLEXERB_2_IO                    (PORTBbits.RB6)
00093         #define PLEXERB_1_TRIS                  (TRISBbits.TRISB5)
00094         #define PLEXERB_1_IO                    (PORTBbits.RB5)
00095         #define PLEXERB_0_TRIS                  (TRISBbits.TRISB4)
00096         #define PLEXERB_0_IO                    (PORTBbits.RB4)
00097 
00098 
00099         #define PLEXERC_S_TRIS                  (TRISEbits.TRISE2)
00100         #define PLEXERC_S_IO                    (PORTEbits.RE2)  // High = disabled
00101         #define PLEXERC_2_TRIS                  (TRISEbits.TRISE2)
00102         #define PLEXERC_2_IO                    (PORTEbits.RE2)
00103         #define PLEXERC_1_TRIS                  (TRISEbits.TRISE1)
00104         #define PLEXERC_1_IO                    (PORTEbits.RE1)
00105         #define PLEXERC_0_TRIS                  (TRISEbits.TRISE0)
00106         #define PLEXERC_0_IO                    (PORTEbits.RE0)
00107 
00108 
00109 
00110         // Factory reset button is RE0
00111         #define BUTTON0_TRIS            (TRISEbits.TRISE0)
00112         #define BUTTON0_IO                      (PORTEbits.RE0)
00113 
00114         
00115         // Inputs
00116         #define SUPPLY_ACTIVE_TRIS              (TRISDbits.TRISD0)
00117         #define SUPPLY_ACTIVE_IO                (PORTDbits.RD0)  // Goes high when external power supply is active
00118 
00119         // A/D ports
00120         #define AN2_TRIS        (TRISAbits.TRISA2)
00121         #define AN3_TRIS        (TRISAbits.TRISA3)
00122         #define AN4_TRIS        (TRISAbits.TRISA4)
00123 
00124 
00125 
00126 // note: BUTTON0_IO used to rest
00127 
00128         // I/O pins
00129         #define LED0_TRIS                       (TRISJbits.TRISJ0)
00130         #define LED0_IO                         (LATJbits.LATJ0)
00131         #define LED1_TRIS                       (TRISJbits.TRISJ1)
00132         #define LED1_IO                         (LATJbits.LATJ1)
00133         #define LED2_TRIS                       (TRISJbits.TRISJ2)
00134         #define LED2_IO                         (LATJbits.LATJ2)
00135         #define LED3_TRIS                       (TRISJbits.TRISJ3)
00136         #define LED3_IO                         (LATJbits.LATJ3)
00137         #define LED4_TRIS                       (TRISJbits.TRISJ4)
00138         #define LED4_IO                         (LATJbits.LATJ4)
00139         #define LED5_TRIS                       (TRISJbits.TRISJ5)
00140         #define LED5_IO                         (LATJbits.LATJ5)
00141         #define LED6_TRIS                       (TRISJbits.TRISJ6)
00142         #define LED6_IO                         (LATJbits.LATJ6)
00143         #define LED7_TRIS                       (TRISJbits.TRISJ7)
00144         #define LED7_IO                         (LATJbits.LATJ7)
00145         #define LED_GET()                       (LATJ)
00146         #define LED_PUT(a)                      (LATJ = (a))
00147 
00148 
00149         // ENC28J60 I/O pins
00150         #define ENC_RST_TRIS            (TRISDbits.TRISD2)      // Not connected by default
00151         #define ENC_RST_IO                      (LATDbits.LATD2)
00152 //      #define ENC_CS_TRIS                     (TRISDbits.TRISD3)      // Uncomment this line if you wish to use the ENC28J60 on the PICDEM.net 2 board instead of the internal PIC18F97J60 Ethernet module
00153         #define ENC_CS_IO                       (LATDbits.LATD3)
00154         #define ENC_SCK_TRIS            (TRISCbits.TRISC3)
00155         #define ENC_SDI_TRIS            (TRISCbits.TRISC4)
00156         #define ENC_SDO_TRIS            (TRISCbits.TRISC5)
00157         #define ENC_SPI_IF                      (PIR1bits.SSPIF)
00158         #define ENC_SSPBUF                      (SSP1BUF)
00159         #define ENC_SPISTAT                     (SSP1STAT)
00160         #define ENC_SPISTATbits         (SSP1STATbits)
00161         #define ENC_SPICON1                     (SSP1CON1)
00162         #define ENC_SPICON1bits         (SSP1CON1bits)
00163         #define ENC_SPICON2                     (SSP1CON2)
00164 
00165         // 25LC256 I/O pins
00166         #define EEPROM_CS_TRIS          (TRISDbits.TRISD7)
00167         #define EEPROM_CS_IO            (LATDbits.LATD7)
00168         #define EEPROM_SCK_TRIS         (TRISCbits.TRISC3)
00169         #define EEPROM_SDI_TRIS         (TRISCbits.TRISC4)
00170         #define EEPROM_SDO_TRIS         (TRISCbits.TRISC5)
00171         #define EEPROM_SPI_IF           (PIR1bits.SSPIF)
00172         #define EEPROM_SSPBUF           (SSPBUF)
00173         #define EEPROM_SPICON1          (SSP1CON1)
00174         #define EEPROM_SPICON1bits      (SSP1CON1bits)
00175         #define EEPROM_SPICON2          (SSP1CON2)
00176         #define EEPROM_SPISTAT          (SSP1STAT)
00177         #define EEPROM_SPISTATbits      (SSP1STATbits)
00178 
00179         // LCD I/O pins
00180         #define LCD_DATA_TRIS           (TRISE)
00181         #define LCD_DATA_IO                     (LATE)
00182         #define LCD_RD_WR_TRIS          (TRISHbits.TRISH1)
00183         #define LCD_RD_WR_IO            (LATHbits.LATH1)
00184         #define LCD_RS_TRIS                     (TRISHbits.TRISH2)
00185         #define LCD_RS_IO                       (LATHbits.LATH2)
00186         #define LCD_E_TRIS                      (TRISHbits.TRISH0)
00187         #define LCD_E_IO                        (LATHbits.LATH0)
00188 
00189 
00190         // UART mapping functions for consistent API names across 8-bit and 16 or 
00191         // 32 bit compilers.  For simplicity, everything will use "UART" instead 
00192         // of USART/EUSART/etc.
00193         #define BusyUART()                              BusyUSART()
00194         #define CloseUART()                             CloseUSART()
00195         #define ConfigIntUART(a)                ConfigIntUSART(a)
00196         #define DataRdyUART()                   DataRdyUSART()
00197         #define OpenUART(a,b,c)                 OpenUSART(a,b,c)
00198         #define ReadUART()                              ReadUSART()
00199         #define WriteUART(a)                    WriteUSART(a)
00200         #define getsUART(a,b,c)                 getsUSART(b,a)
00201         #define putsUART(a)                             putsUSART(a)
00202         #define getcUART()                              ReadUSART()
00203         #define putcUART(a)                             WriteUSART(a)
00204         #define putrsUART(a)                    putrsUSART((far rom char*)a)
00205 
00206 
00207 #endif
